description:
Move the sources/ exclude and sources! rules that apply only to
base_extra_target to the base_extra_target block.

Test base_extra_target==1 for consistency with the base_target==1
conditional in the same file (just a style nit).

R=jam,mark
BUG=none
TEST=no build errors on any platforms

Committed: http://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=51852

messages.text:
John, Mark,

Please note my question in the CL marked with "TODO(wtc)".

I'm pretty sure we can use -Wno-write-strings on Solaris because I see
we use the GCC flags -Wno-sign-compare and -Wextra elsewhere in the
file.  But I don't know what the USE_SYMBOLIZE macro is for.

LGTM

http://codereview.chromium.org/2878027/diff/1/2
File base/base.gypi (right):

http://codereview.chromium.org/2878027/diff/1/2#newcode468
base/base.gypi:468: # TODO(wtc): can this become the 'else' clause of the conditional
I donâ€™t know.

subject: Move the sources/ exclude and sources! rules that apply only to...
